v1.headline: Helping your LinkedIn brand to stand out | Co-Lead @DevQuest | UI UX designer | LinkedIn brand designer | Content designer | Graphic designer
v1.about:
I am an enthusiastic learner and aspiring professional passionate about exploring and excelling in diverse fields such as web development, UI/UX design, programming, and data structures. My journey began with creating a real-time weather-checking web application using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Since then, I have expanded my skill set by delving into advanced JavaScript features, frameworks, and design principles.  

Currently, I am honing my expertise in UI/UX design with projects like a neon-themed VR movie app and a vibrant food delivery app inspired by my favorite color, purple. These experiences have strengthened my ability to create intuitive and visually appealing designs using tools like Figma.  

Alongside web technologies, I am also focused on mastering programming fundamentals and Data Structures & Algorithms (DSA). I enjoy solving problems involving arrays, linked lists, stacks, and recursion. Through these challenges, Iâ€™ve developed a keen interest in logical thinking and efficient coding practices.  

I thrive in collaborative environments, as evident from my group project on book analysis and my active participation in events like CHAIAURCODE and STEM 3.0. My commitment to growth, coupled with a willingness to learn and adapt, drives me to excel in both academic and professional settings.  

Feel free to connect with me for discussions on web development, design, or collaborative opportunities!
